definition: aspiration (phonetics, explosion of breath on consonants distinguishing Chinese p, t from b, d)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Second, the GAP of the unaspirated bilabial plosives is longest.
sentences.chinese: 二是不送氣雙脣塞音的閉塞段時長最長。

sentences.english: To expel a current of air, AS from the mouth or from a bellows.
sentences.chinese: 從嘴或風箱中往外送氣。

sentences.english: In the aspirated situation, the regularity of the length of plosives'GAP is bad.
sentences.chinese: 在送氣情況下，塞音閉塞段時長的規律性較差。
